Text: Corporate Public Affairs DirectoryNew Corporate Public Affairs Directory Available in December Columbia Books is pleased to announce that the edition of the National Directory of Corporate Public Affairs will be available in a few short weeks This new edition is fully updated with over companies and contains contact information including address phone and fax numbers and email addresses for over corporate public affairs executives This directory is a musthave for those interested in networking factfinding and coalition building within the public affairs community To order go to wwwcolumbiabookscom or call National Directory of Corporate Public Affairs Provides contact information for corporate public affairs executives as well as information on corporate giving programs foundations investor relations and PACs ISBN Publication Date December Price includes shipping for US orders Public Affairs Council members are eligible for a discount on the National Directory of Corporate Public Affairs Call for details
